BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Refactor entitlement IT test to allow dynamic policy (#120443) (#120666) This commit combines the different entitlement test plugins used for integration tests into a single plugin. When installing the plugin in the integ test cluster, the entitlement policy and plugin properties are adjusted to test the desired combination of settings. This allows the plugin policy to be dynamically generated by each test, rather than rely on a static policy.
